metadata.title: CVE-2020-7598 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: minimist before 1.2.2 could be tricked into adding or modifying propertiesof Object.prototype using a "constructor" or "__proto__" payload.

criterions.comment: node-minimist: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
